mapper.select: select * from (select postid, userid, nickname, title, postcon, pictureid, postdate, readcount, rec, head, rownum r from (select * from board where postdate between to_date (#{beforemonth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date (#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by rec desc) order by rec desc) where r >= 1 and r <= 5
select * from (select * from fleaboard order by f_postno desc) where rownum >= 1 and rownum <= 5
select * from fimg where imgid = #{imgid}

select count(*) from report where (postid = #{postid} and postid != 0) or (f_postno = #{f_postno} and f_postno != 0) or (pictureid = #{pictureid} and pictureid != 0) or (replyid = #{replyid} and replyid != 0) or (f_cno = #{f_cno} and f_cno != 0)

select reportid from report where (postid = #{postid} and postid != 0) or (f_postno = #{f_postno} and f_postno != 0) or (pictureid = #{pictureid} and pictureid != 0) or (replyid = #{replyid} and replyid != 0) or (f_cno = #{f_cno} and f_cno != 0)
select reporters from report where reportid = #{reportid}
mapper.insert: insert into report (reportid, postid, f_postno, pictureid, replyid, f_cno, reporters) values (report_seq.nextval, #{postid}, #{f_postno}, #{pictureid}, #{replyid}, #{f_cno}, #{reporters})
mapper.update: update report set stack = stack + 1 where reportid = #{reportid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from report a, board b where a.postid = b.postid
select * from (select a.reportid, a.postid, a.stack, a.reporters, b.userid, b.title from report a, board b where a.postid = b.postid) where rownum <= 5
select count(*) from report a, fleaboard b where a.f_postno = b.f_postno
select * from (select a.reportid, a.f_postno, a.stack, a.reporters, b.userid, b.f_title from report a, fleaboard b where a.f_postno = b.f_postno) where rownum <= 5
select count(*) from report a, picture b where a.pictureid = b.pictureid
select * from (select a.reportid, a.pictureid, a.stack, a.reporters, b.userid, b.picpath from report a, picture b where a.pictureid = b.pictureid) where rownum < 5
select count(*) from report a, reply b where a.replyid = b.replyid
select * from (select a.reportid, a.replyid, a.stack, a.reporters, b.userid, b.postid, b.repcon from report a, reply b where a.replyid = b.replyid) where rownum < 5
select count(*) from report a, fleacomment b where a.f_cno = b.f_cno
select * from (select a.reportid, a.f_cno, a.stack, a.reporters, b.userid, b.f_postno, b.f_comment from report a, fleacomment b where a.f_cno = b.f_cno) where rownum < 5
select postid from reply where replyid = #{replyid}
select reporters from report where reportid = #{reportid}
